alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central St. Tammany Parish, western Harrison, central Hancock and south central Pearl River Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stennis Space Center, or 7 miles south of Picayune, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Picayune, Diamondhead, Kiln, Stennis Space Center and Lyman. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 9 and 32. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 8 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
